title: Chapter 1181 - Can I Admit Defeat?
body:
Chapter 1181 - Can I Admit Defeat?

The hum of a sword rang out, startling everyone present.

A moment later, they watched as the gold-robed man’s head rolled off his shoulders.

The stump of his neck was perfectly flat and smooth.

Splurt!

Bright red, scalding blood sprayed from the stump.

Moments later, both the golden-robed man’s corpse and the severed head flying through the air were reduced to ash.

This strange manner of death startled everyone present, and they visibly lost their cool.

“Who did that!?”

The experts of the Studio of the Heart were alarmed, furious, and instantly on guard.

That man in golden robes had been a mid-stage Profound Unity Emperor, yet he’d died out of nowhere. Who wouldn’t have been alarmed?

The old man in hemp’s expression darkened, and his eyes flashed like lightning as he scanned the surrounding area.

Over on the shoreside black boulder, the red-robed man with the fishing rod remained seated, but the depths of his eyes shone with murderous intent.

But someone actually dared to ambush them?

They were seeking death!!

It was amidst this deathly silent, oppressive atmosphere that soft laughter rang out.

“You called Su Xuanjun a bastard? I’m afraid you had to pay for that with your life.” Su Yi sauntered...
